Scheibengraben locality is situated in the left part in the centre
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Research on the small quarry in 1994, there is a drift visible in the front part of the quarry
Photo by M. Nepejchal

Condition of the quarry in 2002, the drift is nearly caved in
Photo by P. Novotný

Locality in 2006
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Digging in a slag heap
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Trial diggings in the surroundings of the locality
Photo by P. Novotný

Green-blue crystal of aquamarine 3 cm
Photo by P. Novotný

Black crystals of tourmaline in pegmatite, sample 5 x 5 cm
Photo by P. Novotný

Pink grain of triplite 9 mm in black schorl
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Black crystals of columbite up to 7 mm
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Blackgreen crystal of gahnite 4 mm in pegmatite
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Transparent tabular crystal of bertrandite 5 mm
Photo by J. Sejkora

Yellow crystal of bismutite 10 x 1 mm in pegmatite
Photo by J. Sejkora

Greenish crystal of bismutite 6 mm in pegmatite
Photo by P. Rozsíval

Grey-green crystal of apatite 4 mm in a crystal of quartz
Photo by P. Novotný

Brown crystal of zircon 2.5 mm in pegmatite, there are greenish tables of muscovite on the left from the zircon
Photo by J. Král

Brilliant cut (diameter 3 mm) made from part of an aquamarine crystal
Photo by P. Novotný
